quote: The merit of all things lies in their difficulty. – Alexandre Dumas
fact: It`s against the law to doze off under a hair dryer in Florida/against the law to slap an old friend on the back in Georgia/against the law to Play hopscotch on a Sunday in Missouri.
joke: Somebody stole my Microsoft Office and they're going to pay - you have my Word.
